title: LFW Mods
brief: The mods here are for "Little Fighter Wemake".
desc: Download Mod, then Open LFWemake and drag the Mod onto the Game.
> Don't need to unzip it after downloading from here.
For how to use, please look at the video below.
If you want to use your own characters, weapons, backgrounds, or even stages in LFWemake,
you can check out this ['Mod Tool'](/tools).
But I'm unable to support AI scripts at present ğŸ¤¦.
Support for AI script functionality may be added in future updates,
and such AI scripts will likely need to be written in TypeScript/JavaScript instead of ActionScript.
